query:
-- Criar uma compra (purchase) simulando pagamento aprovado
INSERT INTO purchases (
  customerName,
  customerEmail,
  customerPhone,
  campaignName,
  campaignSlug,
  planType,
  amountPaid,
  currency,
  couponCode,
  discountAmount,
  status,
  expiresAt,
  createdAt,
  updatedAt
) VALUES (
  'Teste Mercado Pago',
  'teste@peladapro.com.br',
  '11999887766',
  'Campeonato Teste MP',
  'teste-mp-demo',
  '3_months',
  6990,
  'BRL',
  NULL,
  0,
  'completed',
  DATE_ADD(NOW(), INTERVAL 3 MONTH),
  NOW(),
  NOW()
);

-- Pegar o ID da compra criada
SET @purchase_id = LAST_INSERT_ID();

-- Criar o campeonato associado à compra
INSERT INTO campaigns (
  name,
  slug,
  organizerName,
  organizerEmail,
  organizerPhone,
  isActive,
  isDemo,
  purchaseId,
  createdAt,
  updatedAt
) VALUES (
  'Campeonato Teste MP',
  'teste-mp-demo',
  'Teste Mercado Pago',
  'teste@peladapro.com.br',
  '11999887766',
  1,
  0,
  @purchase_id,
  NOW(),
  NOW()
);

-- Verificar se foi criado
SELECT * FROM campaigns WHERE slug = 'teste-mp-demo';
